channel.title: What instrument is this? Oblivion theme
channel.description:
Listen to the theme here: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=V3EOibiVzq4
At ~0:16/0:17 you will hear a wind instrument. It's quite similar, of not the same as the one you can hear in 'Under varje rot och sten' by Finntroll Here (0:03-0:09 and throughout the song): http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QRoSPMYbw48
I think that at least the finntroll song is played on a synth, but there is an instrument that actually makes that sound. I really like it, which is why I want to know what instrument it is.

item.title: What instrument is this? Oblivion theme
item.dc:creator: @Unhandled Unhandled
item.description:
@Unhandled wrote:

sppt it right, it’s a brass for sure. I’m fairly confident it’s just a trumpet played slightly overblown.

Read full topic
item.source: What instrument is this? Oblivion theme

item.title: What instrument is this? Oblivion theme
item.dc:creator: @sppt sppt
item.description:
@sppt wrote:

I’m thinking something like a tuba or french horn.
I’m pretty sure it’s a brass instrument, and not a reed instrument.

Read full topic
item.source: What instrument is this? Oblivion theme
